TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SecurityElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表用於編碼安全性物件的 XML 物件模型。

span.span: Represents the XML object model for encoding security objects.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別被要簡單的 XML 物件模型用於安全性系統，而不做為一般的 XML 物件模型的輕量型實作。This class is intended to be a lightweight implementation of a simple XML object model for use within the security system, and not for use as a general XML object model. 這份文件會假設 XML 的基本知識。This documentation assumes a basic knowledge of XML. 簡單的 XML 物件模型的項目是由下列部分所組成：The simple XML object model for an element consists of the following parts: - 標記是項目名稱。The tag is the element name. - 屬性就會在項目上的零或多個名稱/值屬性組。The attributes are zero or more name/value attribute pairs on the element. - 子系是零或多個項目巢狀``和``。The children are zero or more elements nested within `` and ``. 強烈建議屬性型 XML 表示法用來表示安全性項目和其值。It is strongly suggested that attribute based XML representation is used to express security elements and their values. 這表示項目的屬性會表示為屬性和屬性值會表示為屬性值。This means properties of an element are expressed as attributes and property values are expressed as attribute values. 避免使用巢狀標記內的文字。Avoid nesting text within tags. 針對任何`text`表示的類型表示法``通常使用。For any `text` representation a representation of type `` is usually available. 使用此屬性為基礎的 XML 表示法會增加可讀性，並可讓您輕鬆的 WMI 可攜性產生的 XML 序列化。Using this attribute-based XML representation increases readability and allows easy WMI portability of the resulting XML serialization. 屬性名稱必須是其中一個字元或更長，且不能`null`。An attribute name must be one character or longer, and cannot be `null`. 如果項目為基礎的值表示，項目文字字串`null`表示``形成; 否則會以分隔文字``和``語彙基元。If element-based value representation is used, elements with a text string that is `null` are represented in the `` form; otherwise, text is delimited by the `` and `` tokens. 這兩種形式可以結合屬性，會顯示這些如果有的話。Both forms can be combined with attributes, which are shown if present. 標記、 屬性和文字的項目，如果有的話，會一律區分大小寫。The tags, attributes, and text of elements, if present, are always case-sensitive. XML 格式包含引號，並在需要時來逸出。The XML form contains quotations and escapes where necessary. 在 XML 中包含使用無效的字元的字串值會導致。String values that include characters invalid for use in XML result in an . 這些規則適用於所有屬性和方法。These rules apply to all properties and methods. > [!NOTE] > 基於效能考量，項目會編碼為 XML 文字格式，而不是在每個集合的屬性或方法時，只會檢查字元的有效性。For performance reasons, character validity is only checked when the element is encoded into XML text form, and not on every set of a property or method. 可讓明確檢查所需的靜態方法。Static methods allow explicit checking where needed. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用成員的類別。The following example shows the use of members of the class. [!code-cpp[SecurityElementMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/CPP/SecurityElementMembers.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SecurityElementMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/CS/securityelementmembers.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SecurityElementMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: The name of the attribute.
The value of the attribute.

summary.span: 加入名稱/值屬性至 XML 項目。

span.span: Adds a name/value attribute to an XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名稱和屬性中的值應該只包含有效的 XML 屬性字元。Names and values in attributes should only contain valid XML attribute characters. XML 屬性名稱必須是唯一的。XML attribute names must be unique. 使用從字串中移除無效的字元。Use to remove invalid characters from the string. 沒有引號的字串，支援讓名稱/值組的字串應包含引號或其他需要用引號括住的字元。There is no support for quoted strings, so strings for name/value pairs should not contain quotes or other characters requiring quoting. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用方法，將名稱/值屬性的 XML 項目。The following code shows the use of the method to add a name/value attribute to an XML element. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Collections::Hashtable ^ Attributes { System::Collections::Hashtable ^ get(); void set(System::Collections::Hashtable ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 項目的屬性當做名稱/值組。

span.span: Gets or sets the attributes of an XML element as name/value pairs.

value.span: XML 項目屬性值的 物件。

span.span: The object for the attribute values of the XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個屬性儲存在做為名稱/值組。Each attribute is stored in the as a name/value pair. 名稱與屬性中的值應該包含有效 XML 屬性的字元。Names and values in attributes should contain only valid XML attribute characters. 使用從字串中移除無效的字元。Use to remove invalid characters from the string. 沒有引號的字串，支援讓名稱/值組的字串應包含引號或其他需要用引號括住的字元。There is no support for quoted strings, so strings for name/value pairs should not contain quotes or other characters requiring quoting. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用屬性來取得 XML 項目的屬性。The following code shows the use of the property to get an attribute of an XML element. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有子項目，比較將遞迴地展開。If there are child elements, comparison extends recursively to them. 沒有支援比較不同的 XML 表示的相同字元。There is no support for comparing different XML representations of the same characters. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用方法來比較兩個 XML 項目。The following code shows the use of the method to compare two XML elements. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string Escape(string str) cil managed
Public Shared Function Escape (str As String) As String

param.name: str
param.span: 要逸出無效字元的字串。

span.span: The string within which to escape invalid characters.

summary.span: 將字串中無效的 XML 字元以它們的相等有效 XML 字元來取代。

span.span: Replaces invalid XML characters in a string with their valid XML equivalent.

returns.span: 無效字元被取代後的輸入字串。

span.span: The input string with invalid characters replaced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來取代無效的字元在字串中使用中的字串之前。Use this method to replace invalid characters in a string before using the string in a . 如果使用無效的字元沒有逸出，就會擲回。If invalid characters are used in a without being escaped, an is thrown. 下表顯示不正確的 XML 字元，以及其對等的逸出。The following table shows the invalid XML characters and their escaped equivalents. | 無效的 XML 字元Invalid XML character | 取代為Replaced with | |-----------------------|---------------| | `<` | `<` | | `>` | `>` | | `"` | `"` | | `'` | `'` | | `&` | `&` | ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用方法來取代無效的 XML 字元在字串中使用其有效的 XML 對等。The following code shows the use of the method to replace invalid XML characters in a string with their valid XML equivalent. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[SecurityElementMembers#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/CPP/SecurityElementMembers.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[SecurityElementMembers#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/CS/securityelementmembers.cs#19)] [!code-vb[SecurityElementMembers#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/VB/Form1.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.SecurityElement FromString(string xml) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromString (xml As String) As SecurityElement

param.name: xml
param.span: 用來建立安全性項目的 XML 編碼字串。

span.span: The XML-encoded string from which to create the security element.

summary.span: 從 XML 編碼字串建立安全性項目。

span.span: Creates a security element from an XML-encoded string.
A created from the XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿使用單引號中的 XML 字串。請改用逸出的雙引號。Do not use single quotation marks in the XML string; instead, use escaped double quotation marks. 例如，而不是"`Microsoft"`使用"`Microsoft"`。For example, instead of "`Microsoft"` use "`Microsoft"`. 使用單引號可能會造成例外狀況擲回，或在某些情況下，將單引號字串中以文字方式來處理。Using single quotation marks can result in either an exception being thrown or, in some cases, the single quotation marks being treated as text in the string.

exception.span: 包含一或多個單引號字元。

span.span: contains one or more single quotation mark characters.
is .

param.span: 要在子項目中搜尋的標記。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法相當於下列：This method is equivalent to the following: [!code-cpp[System.Security.SecurityElement#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.securityelement/cpp/remarks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.SecurityElement#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.securityelement/cs/remarks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.SecurityElement#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.securityelement/vb/remarks.vb#1)] 使用 XML，如下所示，`SearchForTextOfTag("second")`會傳回"文字 2"。With XML as follows, `SearchForTextOfTag("second")` would return "text2". ``` text1 text2 ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用方法來尋找的子標籤名稱，並傳回所包含的文字。The following code shows the use of the method to find a child by its tag name and return the contained text. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 項目的標記名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the tag name of an XML element.
The tag name of an XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XML 中，標記會出現在下面顯示的指令碼：In XML, the tag appears in the script as appears below: ``` text ``` 如果這個項目具有子項目，將會取代子系`text`。If this element has child elements, the children will replace `text`. 指定這個屬性才有效的 XML 標記字串。Assign only valid XML tag strings to this property. 使用從字串中移除無效的字元。Use to remove invalid characters from the string. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用屬性來取得 XML 項目的標記名稱。The following code shows the use of the property to get the tag name of an XML element. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 項目中的文字。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文字不應該包含 XML 特殊字元。The text should not contain XML special characters. 使用從字串中移除無效的字元。Use to remove invalid characters from the string. 如果同時包含和，會先出現。If a contains both and , will appear first. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用屬性來取得 XML 項目的文字。The following code shows the use of the property to get the text of an XML element. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 產生 XML 項目的字串表示以及它的構成屬性、子項目和文字。

span.span: Produces a string representation of an XML element and its constituent attributes, child elements, and text.
The XML element and its contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法適用於偵錯以查看元素的 XML 表示法。This method is useful in debugging to see the XML representation of the element.
